amendment.description: Amendment increases funding in the IRS operations support account by $20.7 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the IRS operations support account by $20,748,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Knollenberg amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Knollenberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Knollenberg amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
